page.title: 18FRANKTON, POPULATION - WORK.
page.content: FRANKTONS{POPULATION}IS ABOUT{FOUR {HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-TWO.}MANY PEOPLE WHO WORK ON THE LAND, WORK FOR MITHCELLS THE POTATO GROWERS AND PACKERS. THEIR BASE IS FIRS FARM ALTHOUGH THEY HAVE TAKEN OVER SEVEN OTHER FARMS IN THE AREA. OTHER PEOPLE GO TO RUGBY OR COVENTRY TO WORK. SOME LAIDES WORK AT THE LOCAL EGG ARM. CHILDREN UP TO THE AGE OF 12 GO TO SCHOOL AT STRETTON, THE OLDER ONES TO GO RUGBY. A NUMBER OF LOCAL LADIES WORK AT HOME OR IN A GARAGE SORTING THE SMALL BATTERIES FROM WATCHES,CALCULATORS,CAMERAS, ETC. READY FOR SMELTING TO RETRIEVE THE PRECIOUS METALS. THE BATTERIES ARE COLLECTED WORLD WIDE FOR DESPATCH TO FRANKTON.
